description: This table contains contact specific discrete patient instructions information such as the entering user, entry date, and linked medication.

columns.name: DISCRETE_PAT_INSTR_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier (.1 item) for the instructions name record.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE_REAL
columns.description: A unique contact date in decimal format. The integer portion of the number indicates the date of contact. The digits after the decimal distinguish different contacts on the same date and are unique for each contact on that date. For example, .00 is the first/only contact, .01 is the second contact, etc.

columns.name: CONTACT_DATE
columns.description: The date of this contact in calendar format.

columns.name: CONTACT_SERIAL_NUM
columns.description: The unique contact serial number (CSN) of the discrete patient instructions (DPI) contact. If you use IntraConnect, this is the Unique Contact Identifier (UCI).

columns.name: DISPLAY_NAME
columns.description: Display name of the DPI record.

columns.name: PAT_CSN
columns.description: The contact serial number (CSN) of the patient contact on which these instructions were last edited.

columns.name: ENTERING_USER_ID
columns.description: Stores the user who last edited this record

columns.name: LAST_EDIT_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the last instant the instructions were edited.

columns.name: INSTRUCTIONS_END_UTC_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the date the instructions are no longer valid

columns.name: DISCRETE_PAT_INSTR_SRC_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source of these instructions


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Physician Entered

columns.name: MEDICATION_ID
columns.description: The associated medication record for these instructions

columns.name: INSTANT_OF_ENTRY_DTTM
columns.description: Stores the instant of entry when a record is edited

columns.name: SHOW_CARB_RANGES_YN
columns.description:
Indicates if carbs should be printed with a range (ex "10-19") or not (ex "10") on the AVS.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


No


Yes

columns.name: DOSE_ROUNDING_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates if the AVS insulin injection tables should round Down (first row is 0 units) or round Up (first row is one unit increment).


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Up


Down

columns.name: DOSING_METHOD_C_NAME
columns.description:
Indicates the dosing method used on the insulin injection tables.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Carb Ratio


Fixed Dose


Carb Servings

columns.name: MAX_BLOOD_GLUCOSE
columns.description: Maximum blood glucose, in mg/dL, to display on the AVS insulin injection tables.

columns.name: MAX_CARBOHYDRATES
columns.description: Maximum carbohydrates to display on the AVS insulin injection tables.

columns.name: GLUC_UNIT_INCREMENT
columns.description: Indicates the number of units to increment each row of the AVS insulin injection tables by. Enter a value of 0.5 to get half unit increment behavior.
